body:
I tried reproducing but it looks ok to me.
![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/20454870/d33f5037-cbb9-433f-9972-270cae59b30d)
![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/20454870/a8fdc425-7f73-41ab-8e87-55a1469c603c)

My guess is it's specific to SSH:

https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/5c0fc9087211f01375f208d679a1e6de0685320c/cmd/serv.go#L219-L228

> My guess is it's specific to SSH:
> 
> https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/5c0fc9087211f01375f208d679a1e6de0685320c/cmd/serv.go#L219-L228

Yup, I use SSH authentication for this

@RGBCube is it the opensshd ssh implementation or the built-in to the binary ssh server you are using? The issue would likely apply to both, but just in case it doesn't this will help debug/fix. Thanks for the report :)
Line 227 and line 228, they should not be lowercase.

issue.title: Fix push to create with capitalize repo name

body:
> I tried reproducing but it looks ok to me. ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20454870/303081607-d33f5037-cbb9-433f-9972-270cae59b30d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5Q1gopIGqxom6lnjeF3ETwYPSB9bgb72nzcp-odZZ9o) ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20454870/303081809-a8fdc425-7f73-41ab-8e87-55a1469c603c.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..n0G7UtnuipROuTNemvzFVAJyB7aYHMgJTWJgZw-o-Uc)

You are using http protocol. User can try SSH protocol.

> @RGBCube is it the opensshd ssh implementation or the built-in to the binary ssh server you are using? The issue would likely apply to both, but just in case it doesn't this will help debug/fix. Thanks for the report :)

I'm using sshd at the moment (don't have the BUILTIN_SSH_SERVER option enabled)
The code affected both opensshd and builtin ssh server.
